sizeGuide.title: Choose Your Size with Confidence
sizeGuide.description: Follow the size guide for perfect comfort and style. All you need is to measure your bust and hip accurately, and we will tell you the suitable size for you.
sizeGuide.note: Important Note: It is recommended to use a soft measuring tape, and take the measurements while wearing light clothing for accurate results.

chest.title: How to Measure Bust
chest.steps: Wrap the measuring tape around the fullest part of your chest (usually just above the nipples).Make sure the tape is straight and not too tight or loose.Keep the tape parallel to the floor.

hip.title: How to Measure Hips
hip.steps: Wrap the measuring tape around the widest part of your hips (top of the hip).Ensure the tape is horizontal and parallel.Do not pull the tape too tight.

tips.title: Tips for More Accurate Results
tips.points: It is recommended to take measurements twice to ensure accuracy.If your measurements fall between two sizes, choose the larger size for more comfort.You can ask someone else to help with measuring for more precise results.
